sentence.text: Mutations in positive regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II and oxidative phosphorylation were recently reported in a broad spectrum of neurodegenerative diseases, for example, Parkinson's disease, amyotrophic lateral sclerosis, frontotemporal dementia, or mitochondrial myopathy (MM).

entity.text: positive regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: None of the patients showed positive regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II mutations, whereas 1 sporadic MM patient carried a homozygous Pro96Thr substitution in oxidative phosphorylation.

entity.text: positive regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II
